usbstorage.name: usbstorage
usbstorage.status: One or more devices has experienced an unrecoverable error.
usbstorage.action: Determine if the device needs to be replaced, and clear the errors using 'zpool clear' or replace the device with 'zpool replace'.

backup.name: backup
backup.status: The pool metadata is corrupted and the pool cannot be opened.
backup.action: Destroy and re-create the pool from a backup source.

corrupted.name: corrupted
corrupted.status: One or more devices has experienced an error resulting in data corruption.
corrupted.action: Restore the file in question if possible. Otherwise restore the entire pool from backup.
